problem_summary_simple: Reverse a string given as an array of characters in-place.
problem_summary_technical: Utilizes a two-pointer approach to swap characters from the beginning and end of the character array until pointers meet.
key_insights: The core idea is to swap elements from the start and end of the array.
In-place modification is crucial, avoiding extra memory allocation.
The loop condition `i < j` ensures each pair is swapped exactly once.
